eldoria_city_node.name: City of Eldoria
eldoria_city_node.description: The majestic city of Eldoria stands before you, its gates welcoming travelers. Roads lead south towards the countryside, east into the Deep Woods, and west to the rolling plains.

southern_road_1.name: Southern Road - Part 1
southern_road_1.description: You are on a dusty road leading south from Eldoria. Fields of wheat stretch to the west, while a dark cave entrance looms to the east. The road continues south towards a crossroads.

gloomy_cave_entrance.name: Gloomy Cave Entrance
gloomy_cave_entrance.description: The air is cold and damp around this dark cave mouth. Strange noises echo from within. This looks like a dangerous place.

loose_rocks.description: A pile of loose rocks near the entrance. They look unstable.

outcomes.message: You sift through the rocks but find nothing of interest.
You find a grimy old coin hidden amongst the rocks!
You kick the rocks. A few skitter away. Nothing else happens.

cave_lurker.name: Cave Lurker
cave_lurker.description: A shadowy figure with glowing eyes, partially hidden in the darkness.
cave_lurker.dialogue: *A guttural growl echoes from the shadows... It lunges!*

crossroads_1.name: Dusty Crossroads
crossroads_1.description: A weathered signpost marks this dusty intersection. Paths branch in all directions - north towards Eldoria, south to Riverford, east into dense forest, and west along a riverside path.

southern_road_2.name: Southern Road - Part 2
southern_road_2.description: The road continues south, leading directly to the Town of Riverford. The path north leads back towards Eldoria.

riverford_bridge.name: Riverford Bridge
riverford_bridge.description: A sturdy stone bridge spans the wide river. Riverford's gates are visible to the south, while a dock extends to the east. The road continues north towards Eldoria.

riverford_city_node.name: Town of Riverford
riverford_city_node.description: The quaint town of Riverford lies before you, its northern gates open. The bridge road leads north, while the fisherman's wharf can be seen to the west.
riverford_city_node.on_arrival_message: The gentle sounds of Riverford welcome you.

deep_woods.name: Deep Woods
deep_woods.description:
You are deep within the woods. It's eerily quiet. The path back south is the only clear way out.
You spot a small, old chest on the ground.

chest.description_locked: A small, old wooden chest, bound with iron. It appears to be locked.
chest.description_unlocked: The chest is open. It's empty now.
chest.unlock_message: You use the rusty_key. With a satisfying *click*, the chest unlocks!

forest_entrance_placeholder.name: Edge of the Deep Woods
forest_entrance_placeholder.description: You are at an entrance to the Deep Woods. It looks untamed.

nervous_scout.name: Nervous Scout
nervous_scout.description: A scout pacing back and forth, muttering about 'the beast'.
nervous_scout.dialogue: You there! Have you seen it? The... the beast of the woods! It took my lucky charm!
nervous_scout.dialogue_after_quest_incomplete: Please, find my lucky charm! I can't go on without it.
nervous_scout.dialogue_after_quest_complete: My charm! You found it! Oh, thank you! Here, take this for your trouble.

whispering_woods_path.name: Whispering Woods Path
whispering_woods_path.description: A winding path through the Whispering Woods. Sunlight dapples through the leaves. You hear rustling nearby.
whispering_woods_path.ambient_text: Ethereal whispers dance through the leaves as glowing mushrooms cast shifting shadows on the ancient path.

glowing_mushroom_patch.description: A patch of faintly glowing mushrooms.

outcomes.message: You carefully pick a glowing mushroom.
You pick a mushroom, and a puff of spores makes you feel dizzy for a moment.

hollow_log.description: An old, hollow log lies by the path.

outcomes.message: You search the hollow log and find a small, carved figurine!

wandering_spirit.name: Wandering Spirit
wandering_spirit.description: A translucent figure that seems to hum a sad tune.
wandering_spirit.dialogue: Lost... so long lost... Have you seen the silver locket that shines like the moon?

territorial_boar.name: Territorial Boar
territorial_boar.description: A large, angry-looking boar, snorting and pawing the ground.
territorial_boar.pre_combat_dialogue: The boar glares at you, lets out a loud snort, and seems ready to charge.

1.response: You try to soothe the boar, but it only seems to enrage it further! It charges!

2.response: You slowly back away. The boar watches you intently but doesn't follow. You avoid a fight... for now.

3.response: You ready your weapon and charge the boar!

ancient_grove.name: Ancient Grove
ancient_grove.description: A serene grove with a very old, wise-looking tree at its center.
ancient_grove.ambient_text: Golden rays filter through ancient branches as a gentle hum of natural magic fills the air. Time seems to move differently here.

wise_old_tree.description: A truly ancient tree. It seems to radiate a calm energy.

outcomes.message: You touch the ancient bark and feel a sense of peace wash over you.
You rest under the wise old tree and recover 10 HP.

western_plains_1.name: Western Plains
western_plains_1.description: Rolling grasslands stretch out before you. A warm breeze carries the scent of wild flowers.

wheat_fields.name: Golden Wheat Fields
wheat_fields.description: Vast fields of golden wheat sway gently in the breeze. A well-worn path cuts through the crops.

wheat_stalks.description: Tall stalks of golden wheat ready for harvest.

outcomes.message: You gather some wheat into a bundle.

forest_trail_1.name: Forest Trail
forest_trail_1.description: A narrow trail winds through dense forest. Shadows dance between the trees. The trail continues west towards the crossroads and south into a denser part of the forest.

riverside_path.name: Riverside Path
riverside_path.description: A peaceful path runs alongside a gently flowing river. Fish occasionally break the surface.

fishing_spot.description: A good spot for fishing by the river's edge.

fishermans_wharf.name: Fisherman's Wharf
fishermans_wharf.description: A busy wharf where fishing boats dock. The smell of salt and fish fills the air. Paths lead east towards Riverford proper and towards the coastal paths.

old_fisherman.name: Old Fisherman
old_fisherman.description: A weathered fisherman mending his nets.
old_fisherman.dialogue: Ah, looking to try your luck at fishing? The river's been good to us lately.

1.text: Show me what you have for sale.

2.response: Keep your line steady and be patient. The fish will come.

misthaven_city_node.name: City of Misthaven
misthaven_city_node.description: A mysterious city shrouded in perpetual mist, its spires piercing through the fog. The west gate connects to the forest road, while the north path leads into mystical woods.
misthaven_city_node.on_arrival_message: The ethereal mists of Misthaven swirl around you.

forest_road_1.name: Forest Road
forest_road_1.description: A well-maintained road cutting through the dense forest. Misthaven's mists can be seen to the east, while trading caravans frequently travel west towards the crossroads.

traveling_merchant.name: Traveling Merchant
traveling_merchant.description: A cheerful merchant with a heavily laden pack mule.
traveling_merchant.dialogue: Heading to Misthaven? Watch out for the fog - easy to lose your way!
traveling_merchant.dialogue_after_quest_incomplete: If you find my ledger in the mists, I'll make it worth your while!
traveling_merchant.dialogue_after_quest_complete: My ledger! Thank you! Here's a map I've made of the safest routes.

bayside_city_node.name: City of Bayside
bayside_city_node.description: A bustling port city with ships from distant lands. The docks stretch along the southern shore, while the north road leads to Riverford.
bayside_city_node.on_arrival_message: Salt air and seabird calls welcome you to Bayside.

coastal_road_1.name: Coastal Road
coastal_road_1.description: A scenic road following the coastline. Bayside's port is visible to the south, while Riverford can be reached by heading northeast.

tidepool.description: A shallow pool left by the retreating tide.

outcomes.message: You find some interesting shells, but nothing valuable.

riverside_dock.name: Riverside Dock
riverside_dock.description: A long wooden dock stretches over the river. Small boats ferry people between here and the coastal road.

ferry_stop.description: A small ferry service operates here.

ferry_operator.name: Ferry Operator
ferry_operator.description: A weathered sailor manning the ferry.
ferry_operator.dialogue: Need a ride downstream? The ferry runs regular trips to the coast.

forest_path_east_1.name: Eastern Forest Path
forest_path_east_1.description: A path winding through the dense forest. The southern road lies west, while deeper forest paths continue east. A trail leads north deeper into the woods.

forest_path_east_2.name: Deep Forest Path
forest_path_east_2.description: The forest grows thicker here. Forest sounds echo all around.

fallen_tree.description: A massive fallen tree covered in moss.

outcomes.message: You find some rare herbs growing on the tree!

coastal_path_1.name: Upper Coastal Path
coastal_path_1.description: A winding path along the coast. Fisherman's Wharf lies to the north, while the path continues south towards Bayside.

coastal_path_2.name: Lower Coastal Path
coastal_path_2.description: The coastal path nears Bayside. The dockside market can be seen to the east.

coastal_path_3.name: Shoreline Path
coastal_path_3.description: The path curves along the shoreline. Bayside's walls are visible to the south.

mystic_woods_path_1.name: Upper Mystic Woods Path
mystic_woods_path_1.description: A misty path winding through ancient trees. The Ancient Grove lies to the north.

mystic_woods_path_2.name: Lower Mystic Woods Path
mystic_woods_path_2.description: The mist grows thicker here. Misthaven's spires can be seen looming to the south.

strange_mist.description: The mist seems to move with an otherworldly purpose.

outcomes.message: Shapes seem to form and dissolve in the mist...

dockside_market.name: Dockside Market
dockside_market.description: A bustling market near the docks. Merchants sell goods from distant lands.
